Html:
I've been successful at accessing any of the windows that appear in the "Select-Windows" list.  But, how do I access the Taskbar - specifically the Start button?  I have been using Task Manager and UI Spy to display the properties of the various controls, but I haven't figured out how the TaskBar.

The access key is Ctrl-Esc, but what window do I send it to?  I've tried sending it to any open window, but it hasn't work so far.

The 'flag' key on the keyboard will also bring up the Start Menu, but I haven't located a key code for that key.

 

Thanks in advance . . .
